amount.description: The amount of health to restore.
amount.markdownDescription: The amount of health to restore.

type.description:
## Heal

---



[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/heal)

Restores a specified amount of health to the entity.

Type ID: `origins:heal`




---

### Examples

```json
"entity_action": {
    "type": "origins:heal",
    "amount": 6
}
```

This example will restore about 3 hearts to the entity.
